natural_language: Updates will be installed as long as there is enough disk space and the update is available.
ground_truth: SOFTWARE_INSTALL PROVIDED THAT ENOUGH_DISK_SPACE AND UPDATE_AVAILABLE

natural_language: The application will launch as long as the operating system is up to date and the user is logged in.
ground_truth: APPLICATION_LAUNCH PROVIDED THAT OPERATING_SYSTEM_UPDATED AND USER_LOGGED_IN

natural_language: The feature will be enabled as long as the user is authenticated and the feature is available.
ground_truth: FEATURE_ENABLED PROVIDED THAT USER_AUTHENTICATED AND FEATURE_AVAILABLE

natural_language: The service will start automatically as long as manual mode is not selected and the service is configured.
ground_truth: SERVICE_START PROVIDED THAT NOT MANUAL_MODE_SELECTED AND SERVICE_CONFIGURED

natural_language: The device will enter sleep mode as long as there have been 5 minutes of inactivity and the device is idle.
ground_truth: SLEEP_MODE PROVIDED THAT INACTIVITY_5MIN AND DEVICE_IDLE

natural_language: Notifications will appear as long as do not disturb mode is disabled and the phone is switched on.
ground_truth: NOTIFICATIONS PROVIDED THAT DND_MODE_DISABLED AND PHONE_ON

natural_language: The backup will proceed as long as the storage device is connected and backup is enabled.
ground_truth: BACKUP_PROCEED PROVIDED THAT STORAGE_CONNECTED AND BACKUP_ENABLED

natural_language: The system will reboot as long as no critical processes are running and a reboot is requested.
ground_truth: SYSTEM_REBOOT PROVIDED THAT NOT CRITICAL_PROCESSES_RUNNING AND REBOOT_REQUESTED

natural_language: The settings will be saved as long as the form is validated and the user has confirmed.
ground_truth: SETTINGS_SAVED PROVIDED THAT FORM_VALIDATED AND USER_CONFIRMED

natural_language: The connection will be established as long as the network is available and a connection is requested.
ground_truth: CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED PROVIDED THAT NETWORK_AVAILABLE AND CONNECTION_REQUESTED
